text:
A board of control, appointed by the Association of
Land-Grant Colleges and Universities, determines the
broad policies of NPAC. The association appoints
the board from individuals nominated by the initiat¬
ing and supporting associations and organizations.
Current members of the board, and the groups by
which nominated, are:
Association of Land-Grant Colleges and Universities
FRED S. HULTZ
President, North Dakota Agricultural College
Extension Committee on Organization and Policy
E. W. JANIKE
Associate Director of Extension, University of Nebraska
Experiment Station Committee on Organization and Policy
‘MARK T. BUCHANAN
Director of Experiment Stations, State College of Washington
American Agricultural Editors' Association
fPAUL JOHNSON
Editor, Prairie Farmer, Chicago, Illinois
National Association of Television and Radio Farm Directors
SAM B. SCHNEIDER
Farm Director, KVOO, Tulsa, Oklahoma
American Association of Agricultural College Editors
“GEORGE CHURCH
Publications Editor, Oklahoma A. & M. College
FRANK JETER
Agricultural Editor, North Carolina State College
LESTER A. SCHLUP
Director, Division of Information Programs,
Extension Service, USDA
WILLIAM B. WARD
Head, Department of Extension Teaching & Information,
Cornell University
Michigan State University
T. K. COWDEN
Dean of Agriculture, Michigan State University
‘Chairman; fVice-Chairman; “Secretary

Stanley Andrews

John A. Morrow
